projects.1: Taking part in the development of a hybrid mobile app focused on smart boilers, including new functionalities and improving usability. We use Vue.js with Ionic and SASS.
projects.2: Working hand in hand with design and marketing creating websites for a banking sector client, with focus on UX/UI and conversion. I contribute to the development of business logic and leads management. We use JavaScript, CSS, PHP, mySQL and a custom CMS.
projects.3: Part of the development of a new design system for a business group in the telecommunications sector, creating components and contributing to improve brand consistency and project scalability. Using JavaScript, Symfony (PHP & Twig), SASS and Webpack.

projects.1: Collaborating with a freelance designer in branding, web and brand creation processes.
